title: Dataimport UI defaults should reflect the documented states
description: The wiki states that some dataimport commands are enabled by default. These states should be reflected in the web ui because currently it leads to confusions if the commands are enabled or not.

comments.author: Alexandre Rafalovitch
comments.content:
Has this been checked against new Admin UI?
If not, perhaps close it and open with more specific issue when it comes up.
